phrs.translation: 审判的, 可译作, 以貌取人, 可译作“指手画脚”
判断抽样, 本研究进行判断式抽样, 专业判断布点采样法
翻译, 判断性知识, 判断知识英语

sentences.sentence: Just listen; just watch, while holding non-judgemental compassion in your hearts.
sentences.translation: 当你需要要怜悯之心做判断时，你只需要听，只需要看。

sentences.sentence: Please make me look past all the superficial, and please make me refrain from being too judgemental.
sentences.translation: 请让我能够透过现象看本质，还有请让我克制不要再批判。

sentences.sentence: But then, Mandelson is possibly less judgemental of types who lie on their mortgage application forms.
sentences.translation: 但另一方面，曼德尔森可能对那些在按揭申请表上撒谎的人却不那么挑三拣四(可能暗讽英国的报销门事件—译者注)。
